title: 158 - Affleck's Best Self
description: Today's episode of The Pod opens up discussing the latest going on in their lives, many of the boys are in Florida as Pat prepares for another episode opf Friday Night Smack DAHN on Fox. The boys dive into all of their latest shows and movies they have been watching. They then jump into the Pof FOD which covers all things from Mitts latest tiktok adventures, Ben Affleck's growth, and much much more. Don't forget to subscribe to YouTube.com/thepodpmi to watch full episodes of The Pod, and send your questions to @ThePodPMI on twitter and Instagram. We appreciate you all for listening, and hope you have an incredible weekend. We'll see you Wednesday.
